availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Abraham Lyons (Mercer County, Kentucky, farm hand)

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, farm hand. Kentucky native. Married to Jane Lyons. Father of Eliza J. Lyons, William F. Lyons, and Charles W. Lyons. Farm hand in Mercer County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, District 2, p. 66-67.
Find A Grave, "Abraham Lyons (May 17, 1836-June 6, 1918)," Memorial #59175522, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/59175522 (accessed May 29, 2018).
